| Mukul Dev Kaushal birth_date =  birth_place = Delhi death_date =  death_place = nationality = Indian
| other_names = Mukul known_for = Dastak relatives = Rahul Dev(Brother)
| occupation = Film actor, Model years active = 1996 - present
}} 'Mukul Dev' is an Indian actor known for his Hindi films and TV serials and
music albums. He received the 7th Amrish Puri Award, for excellence in acting
for his role in Yamla Pagla Deewana. He has also acted in South-
Indian films. {{cite news|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2011-04-21/news-
interviews/29458871_1_hindi-film-mukul-dev-share-screen-space |title=Mukul Dev's
dozen films in two years |publisher=Times of India |accessdate=19 Oct 2011 |date=2011-04-
21}}

He is also a trained pilot from the Indira Gandhi Rashtriya Uran
Akademi.
